item.title: I added a portal
item.dc:creator: @squal707 squal707
item.description:
@squal707 wrote:

case 7289:
if (playerRights >= 3)
if(actionTimer == 0) {
sendMessage(“Welcome to Members Land!”);
sendMessage(“Enjoy your benefits, and dont brag =P”);
teleportToX = xxxx;
teleportToY = xxxx;
heightLevel = 0;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
break;

it would be this you dont need the {

item.title: I added a portal
item.description:
@11131 wrote:

Erm i think this is where it all goes

case 7289: if(playerRights >= 3) { if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("Welcome to Members Land!"); sendMessage("Enjoy your benefits, and dont brag =P"); teleportToX = xxxx; teleportToY = xxxx; heightLevel = 0; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } break;

Don’t take my word for it though, you could try if you wish but make a backup of the code, I aint coded in ages

item.title: I added a portal
item.dc:creator: @Element_SoftwareTM Element SoftwareTM
item.description:
@Element_SoftwareTM wrote:

Hello,
I added a portal, and made it teleport to where i got to go, and it looks like this…

case 7289: if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("Welcome to Members Land!"); sendMessage("Enjoy your benefits, and dont brag =P"); teleportToX = xxxx; teleportToY = xxxx; heightLevel = 0; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } break;
How can I make requirments of a level 3 admin only can enter?[br][size=1]Posted on: November 15, 2007, 07:26:26 PM[/size][hr] ?
